entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
